commits.body:
Add a new command that does syntax validation on the JSON file and shows the
error message in a tooltip. Behaviour is consistent with other language
bundles where syntax validation is implemented.
commits.summary: Add Validate Syntax command - <kbd class='keyEquivalent'>⌃+</kbd><kbd class='keyEquivalent'>⇧+</kbd>V
commits.author: Ram

commits.body: This was also the behavior prior to last commit.
commits.summary: Show tool tip when prettifying JSON fails
commits.author: Allan Odgaard

commits.body:
For reasons I didn’t care to learn, the ruby wrapper would stall for large JSON files.

While the command is simply calling the python JSON tool (module) it has a shell shebang as I am not sure what code is required to replicate python’s ‘-m’ switch.
commits.summary: Drop intermediate ruby code for JSON prettifier
commits.author: Allan Odgaard

commits.summary: Add indent patterns and smart typing pairs.
commits.author: Michael Sheets
